entries.content: Objections are often just requests for information, not outright rejections.
entries.notes: Implied by the speaker's frustration with people 'pumping for information' instead of buying.

entries.content: 85% of inbound inquiries are not buyers but people seeking free information.
entries.notes: Demonstrates how objections (delays/no money) mask info-seeking behavior.

entries.content: Charge a fee to filter info-seekers from genuine buyers.
entries.notes: Tactical response to separate objections (info requests) from real opportunities.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
